meanings.definition: A small tree or shrub of the genus Arbutus.
meanings.sent1: The arbute in the garden has beautiful red berries.
meanings.sent2: I picked an arbute from the tree and it tasted sweet.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the arbute for a strawberry and tried to bury it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the song of an arbute tree in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the arbute filled the air with a delightful fragrance.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the arbute tree, resembling a strawberry.
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious jam using the ripe arbutes.
meanings.sent2: The arbute looked so much like a strawberry that I almost bit into it.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game pretending the arbutes were tiny red bombs.
meanings.sent4: The arbute's sweetness was a pleasant surprise on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the arbute made it stand out among the green leaves.
